artist: Artist: Georges Adéagbo; Publisher: Edizioni CTL, Hamburg, Germany
description: white soft wove paper cover; semi-transparent pages with photographic reproductions in black and white of handwriting, people, newspapers; text; advertisements; bound volume; lender's archive #216
inscription:
Inscribed in pencil on colophon: \"[_]eu serait l\'art, et que deviendrait l\'art, si le-contenu de l\'art, ne fait pas voir la vérité\"...\'

Also inscribed with indecipherable signature
markings:
Numbered on colophon page: No 15
Watermark: A on inside flap, front and back
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: signed in pencil on colophon: Georges Adéagbo
title: Pour les Collectioneurs d'Oeuvres d'Art: Monument Symbolique d'Allemagne (for "The Story of the Lion")
